you
[Music]
hi and welcome you're listening to the
x22 report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1373 a and today's date is
September 7th 2017 and the title of the
episode is central banks decide that
discontinuing stimulus will collapse the
economy let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now there's a
lot going on weather-wise we know that
Harvey hit Texas we know that Irma is
heading towards Florida and we realized
that there are other hurricanes that are
approaching and what we're seeing is
that the corporate media they are now
maneuvering to say you know these
hurricanes are causing problems in the
economy and the latest thing is that
jobless claims they've spiked since 2005
the most since 2005 and they're saying
this is part of Harvey the hangover of
Harvey and right now what we're looking
at is that initial jobless claims they
spiked to about 62,000 last week thanks
to a 51,000 surge in Texas now this is
only temporary
this is not going to be permanent as we
can see that you know once Texas gets on
its feet and once the kurma passes
through Florida yes for a short period
of time
things will happen but again the initial
jobless claims this has been manipulated
all along there really is nothing true
about it just like the unemployment
numbers these are completely manipulated
and we could see right now that the
initial jobless claims they have falling
and falling and falling and if we look
back in time every time initial jobless
claims got to this level or even lower
or a little bit higher what happens is
the economy goes into a recession and
basically this is where we're headed
because we've been looking at all the
economic indicators would be looking at
what has been going on and we can see
that retail well it is getting hammered
right now Toys R Us
well they've hired a bankruptcy law firm
and this law firm is Kirkland and Ellis
and they are a bankruptcy and
restructuring practice and they are the
leader in the booming bankruptcy and
restructuring industry and right now
Toys R Us has about 1694 stores globally
they have about
5.2 billion in long-term debt and what
we're looking at is that they are losing
sales now again they have an online
presence this has nothing to do with
online sales what this has to do with is
that the people they don't have the
extra funds to spend on toys that's
basically what it is and right now sales
they are down by 15% now the company
needs to restructure its debts
particularly 400 million that is coming
to in 2018 and a bankruptcy filing is
one of the options and we see this
happening to a lot of the retail market
where stores are saying you know
something we just can't make ends meet
we don't have the sales and that's one
thing that you can't fake you can't fake
sales it's either you have sales or you
don't have sales earnings you know
buying back stocks and manipulating your
accounting numbers you can do that but
sales and revenue very difficult to do
and this is where corporations are
starting to get into trouble because
their sales are just not there now we
talked about the housing market and we
know there's many many bubbles all over
the place and the US Department of
Housing and Urban Development suggests
that you spend no more than 30 percent
of your annual budget on housing costs
as it could put you and your family at
greater risk of being unable to afford
other necessities now this is the rule
of thumb that you're supposed to use and
we know that during the 2008 crisis well
basically that didn't happen people were
basically spending a lot more their
mortgages were very high and it seems
like we're back in that same exact
position when we look at this website
how much net they're saying that the
average American family spends roughly
fifty seven thousand per year and have
thrown caution to the wind with housing
costs eating up nearly 33 percent of
their annual budget so they're saying in
all there are about 40 million houses or
about one third that are occupied by
people who can't afford them and what's
very interesting about all of this is
where are most of these homes located
well they're located in the 20
where they're blowing up these bubbles
remember all those people that purchase
their homes at the height of the market
back in 2008 most of those people are
underwater right now where they've never
reached the same exact level where they
purchased their house they have
mortgages that are very very high and
most of them are completely underwater
so what we're seeing right now is that
we are headed down the same exact path
now data from Harvard found that over 18
million households are currently stuck
spending more than 50% of their annual
income on housing which is up 35 percent
compared to 2001 levels and we could see
at this point that we are in a bit of
trouble here because incomes are going
down and as incomes continually slide
and as more and more people lose their
jobs this is going to be a major problem
now something very interesting about all
this is this also has to do with renters
because right now the report is saying
that more than 11 million renter
households pay at least half of their
incomes for housing so we can see that
we are headed to a point where a lot of
individuals they're going to be in
trouble just like they were back in 2008
now the central banks they are looking
at the economy we know we have very low
interest rates we know that they're
continuing with stimulus they have not
stopped us whatsoever we know that the
Fed has been adding to their balance
sheet it's approaching 20 trillion
dollars and we can see right now that
the central banks they understand and
they realize if they stop stimulus the
economy is going to collapse and this is
why they haven't stopped it this is why
they haven't raised interest rates this
is why interest rates are in the
negative territory now the easy being
they have kept their three key rates and
their pace of QE completely unchanged
and they've came they've come out with
their statement and they're saying that
they're not going to stop this until
maybe 2018 now of course they always
push this off into the future making
everyone think that this is when they're
going to stop it but they cannot stop
the pace of stimulus if the central
banks start to raise rates and they stop
the stimulus the economy
is doomed they know this this is why it
has not stopped this is why the Fed is
continually adding to their balance
sheet because they realize that we're
headed towards a major collapse of the
system and if they stop stimulus now and
everyone realizes that they're stopping
and they're start raising interest rates
and the economy collapses everyone is
going to blame them so R at this point
they understand what is happening now
something very interesting now this is
not published widely over the corporate
media because they really don't want you
to know about gold and this is an
insurance policy against the economy
coming down about also the Fiat dollar
collapsing but Goldman Sachs was out
there and they are saying that physical
gold is the true currency of last resort
gold is a hedge against geopolitical
risks when the event leads to a
debasement of the dollar and basically
what they are saying because they
understand and all these banks
understand that eventually what's going
to happen is that dollar is going to die
and what I mean by that it's going to be
devalued and devalued and devalued and
it will be worth absolutely nothing
because when you have so much debt and
dollars all in circulation you see
inflation and that is worth noting what
goes up well cryptocurrency can go up
gold silver definitely will go up and we
can see this is exactly what is
happening now they're saying that gold
is increasing right now not because of
the geopolitical events that we're
seeing now with North Korea and
everything like that
this has to do with the market mechanics
the underlying economy so what we're
seeing right now is these banks they
understand they've been accumulating a
lot of gold a lot of silver don't be
fooled by this central banks have been
accumulating gold and silver countries
have been accumulating gold and silver
because they realize they understand
that the dollar is not going to last now
James Rickards was out there and he's
been talking about crypto currencies and
he's saying that the central banks and
countries they don't want to put an end
to the crypto currencies they want to
control the crypto currencies
he's saying that there is every
indication that governments regulators
tax authorities and the global elite are
moving in for the crypto kill he said
the future of Bitcoin and all the other
cryptocurrencies may be a dystopia in
which Big Brother controls what's called
the blockchain and decides when and how
you can buy or sell anything and
everything this is what they want to do
because they understand that this is
going to be the next generation of
electronic currency and they don't want
this to be an open decentralized system
they want control of the entire system
they want control of the blockchain
because governments central bank's they
don't like competition especially when
it comes to money governments know they
cannot stop the blockchain in fact they
don't want to what they want is control
using powers of regulation taxation and
investigation and ultimately more COPE
coercive powers including arrests
imprisonment and everything else so you
can see they're already starting to put
this into place because what they really
want to do is they want to control what
is going on here now the elite the US
legal institution called the uniform law
Commission that proposes models laws
intended for adoption in all 50 states
has released its latest proposal called
the uniform regulation of virtual
currency business Act this new law will
not only provide a regulatory scheme for
state regulators but will also be a
platform for litigation for private
plaintiffs and class-action lawyers
seeking recourse against real or
imagined abuses of digital coin exchange
exchanges and facilities
now once litigation begins anonymity is
the first casualty and we could see that
they're already putting this stuff into
place and it's not just the United
States it's Russia it's China and many
other countries because they want to
control the system now this system I do
believe should be open and free should
be completely decentralized we don't
need governments central banks
controlling the system just like the
Internet it works much better when it's
open and free when Google or
which is part of Google the government
the FCC the UN starts to get involved
this is when things are being censored
this is when things are being blocked
this is when everything is being
controlled so what we're seeing right
now is they want control of the
blockchain technology and this is what
they're moving to do so they understand
that things are starting to fall apart
they understand that the cryptocurrency
market is going to be the next
electronic type of currency they know
the dollar is not going to make it
because we could see already that
Goldman Sachs is out there and we can
see that everything is moving from the
west to the east so what we're seeing
right now is this great destruction of
the economy they can't stop stimulus
debt is continually growing all the
economic indicators that we've been
looking at are continually deteriorating
nothing has been improved there's no
manufacturing coming back to United
States jobs the high paying jobs are not
being added everything is still
manipulated and what we're seeing right
now is that this whole thing is going to
come to an end and when it does come to
an end you better be ready and prepared
for what is coming because it is coming
faster and faster we've been following
this we're not predicting anything
we're following each indicator to show
you what's really going on the corporate
media likes to keep everyone in the
illusionary world the government likes
to keep everyone in the illusionary
world the central banks likes to keep
everyone in the illusionary world they
kept everyone in the illusionary world
back in 2008 when they told you
everything was fine they're not
forecasting any type of recession these
subprime securities were triple-a but we
come to find out that was all a lie and
right now we are looking into every
aspect of the economy showing that
basically we're already in a recession
again they're not going to admit this
until much much later so we are headed
to a major collapse you need to get
ready you need to get prepared because
it's almost upon us
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
